name: School
author: Cobalt
Hopkirk
JhenMohran
Lucario_3
Princess Luna
Rentorar
TheUnknownOne
summary: In an ordinary school a great battle is taking place. The students must defend themselves from the threat of expulsion/death by the evil teachers or lone principal and stop the bullies from stealing their lunch money. The bully, teacher and student roles have a self convert that gives a random new role (although the name on the role list will not change).
drawmsg: The school was closed down. This is why you people can't have nice things...

changelog.11.1.2013#2: Vigilante fixed, night phase increased by 2 ticks (35), Teachers appear later in the spawn lists for 4-19 games.
changelog.11.2.2013: Many help messages changed, roles now have their own unique translations but still reveal as a normal student/teacher/bully, new roles for failed conversions.
changelog.11.3.2013: Teacher and Bully bodyguards can now target their teammates, broadcast added for many roles.
changelog.11.6.2013: Miller Students fixed, added a "Convert only" note to some /roles, re-add voteshield Teacher for roles1, tweaked Teacher/Bully converts, improved Teacher/Bully samurai help message, team talk added for Teachers/Bullies.

sides.winmsg: The students, ~Players~, saved all the pupils from being expelled. Shame they don't have any teachers now.
The school passed its ofsted inspection thanks to the teachers, ~Players~. Too bad about not having any students.
The bullies, ~Players~, won. Now give them your lunch money!
The principal, ~Players~, expelled everyone else and used the budget to give themself a bonus.

roles.help: You're a student and without you there wouldn't be a school! Despite this, the bullies and teachers are all trying to get you expelled or kill you and take your lunch money. You're getting a rather good education so you can /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self during the night to gain new powers. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You failed your test and couldn't become what you wanted. You have another chance though, use /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self during the night to gain new powers. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the nerd of the school. Because of that, you're pretty smart (well, maybe the other way around). You can /inspect [name] during the night to find out what side they're on. If you don't like being a nerd you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night (only reveals side). Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the nerd of the school. Because of that, you're pretty smart (well, maybe the other way around). You can /inspect [name] during the night to find out what side they're on. If you don't like being a nerd you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night (reveals them as a random role). Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the medicine student. With your knowledge, you can heal people (with medicine obviously). If someone is in danger, you can /protect [name] during the night to give them nice medicine. If you want an easier course you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can protect one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: Which part of the football squad are you? The goal scorer? The creative midfielder? Nope, you're the rock solid defense! Hold this team together and keep those bad guys from getting past! During the night, you can /shield [name] someone. But if that's too much work for you, one can always be LEFT BACK in the changing rooms by using /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can shield one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You've become a politics student, learning the fine art of covering your own behind. Use your newly acquired skills to your advantage and /protect yourself from expulsion during the night, and help your fellow students by democratically voting during the day! If, for some strange reason, you get bored of politics, you can /leave the class to find another one.
roles.info: Can protect self during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the literature student. During the night you can /read [name] a book to someone. With the knowledge from the book, they will survive for another day, but those ungrateful people will probably fall asleep during your great lecture and be unable to act. When you're bored of reading books you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can read (distract and protect) one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're now a biology student, learning the ins and outs of living things. As such, you can /safeguard [name] a fellow schoolmate from any nasty poisons and toxins that come his way, though if you get squeamish around dissected frogs, you can always /leave the class and join one involving less blood.
roles.info: Can safeguard one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You've been studying law so you know pretty much all the school rules. You can /kill [name] someone during the night and they'll be expelled, even the principal (although quite brutally..)! If you realise everyone hates you, it may be a smart idea to /leave, so you can become a normal student again, and hopefully they won't remember you were killing them/charging them high fees!
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You've become a philosophy student, and you've decided all this violence in the school just isn't ethical. Think hard about who you should /kill [name] for the greater good, you've only got one shot at it! You can always /leave the class if your brain starts hurting too much.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night, once per game. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the rebel of the school. You don't really do what you're told, one being not to kill other students. You clearly don't care, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel them. Watch out though, people know what you're planning and will take you back for it. If this rebel thing isn't something for you, /leave is always a possibility.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night, suiciding themself. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the straight A student so you're good at everything. You can use /inspect, /kill, /protect and /distract [name] once each and do perfectly in every one. If you like having variety in your grades you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can distract, kill, protect or inspect one person during the night, each command can only be used once. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're part of the school’s kendo society and are training to be a samurai in your free periods. You can /slice [name] someone in the day and since everyone will see you do it they'll know you're "a proper samurai", not just some idiot with a big sword. If you want to do something with employment prospects that don’t involve cutting people up you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can slice (kill) one person during the day. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

slice.msg: You can now slice someone in half [/slice [name]]! :
slice.killmsg: ~Self~ approaches ~Target~, says hello, and slices them in half, within a split second.

roles.help: You're the media student and you want a good story. You can't hack people's phones but you can stalk them (that's legal right?) using /stalk [name] to find out where they've gone. If media studies isn't something for you then you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can stalk one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: Give us a D, give us an I... what does it spell? DISTRACTOR!!! Use /distract [name] to make a target's actions fail or if cheerleading is too much for you it's always possible to /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can distract one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: Pssssssst! Guess what I just heard! A friend of that person over there just said that I was the gossip of the school! Can you believe that! I'm going to tell everyone about it with /send [name] (night expose to one person) but then I might get bored of that so I can always /leave to become a student again.
roles.info: Can send (dummy; night expose to one person) one person during the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

send.dummytargetmsg: Psst, ~Target~, I'm ~Self~, the Gossip. I am friendly and you know this to be true, pass it on!

roles.help: You're the gymnast of the school. Your skill at gymnastics makes it easy for you to avoid bullets. You avoid all kills but if for some reason you don't want to, you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Evades nightkills. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: On your marks, get set, GO and zig-zag to avoid that sniper fire! You avoid 80% of all kills aimed at you! Otherwise you can run back to the square one with /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Evades 80% of nightkills. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the dunce of the school. You're not very smart and at the moment you're sitting in the corner because you're so bad at mafia. You can't become a normal student as it's hard to work out how to take your hat off but you still have a vote (considering they let you have a vote you've got to ask who's the real dunce...).
roles.info: Has no actions. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You can't really be bothered doing anything which is probably why everyone says you're a slacker. You can't even be bothered to turn up to votings on who to lynch, so your vote counts as 0. If you ever get your act together you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Has no special actions. Vote counts as 0. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You know what's great? Numbers! You're the mathematics student and your favourite number is two (for obvious reasons) so your vote counts as 2. If you no longer like maths you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Vote counts as 2. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You've taken up statistics, you boring person, you! Analyse the data your fellow students uncover and use it to save someone from a terrible fate with your -2 vote! You can /leave this class to join another, but, statistically speaking, there's a one in thirty-four chance you'll end up here again.
roles.info: Vote counts as -2. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: People seem to think that just because you're a physics student that you'll have lots of bombs. It's a lie, you only have one which you'll use to kill anyone who kills you. If you don't like bombs you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Revenges nightkills and daykills. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the absentee and you don't know why someone would go to school. Not being at school makes it kind of hard for you to get killed so twice a game you can use /commute to protect and safeguard yourself. If you want to go to school you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can commute (safeguard and protect) self twice per game in the night. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the kindergartner and nobody really thinks you could be killing people. During the day you may /reveal yourself to the whole world that you're not bad. If you get an urge to become violent you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can reveal self during the day. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the unpopular student. Nobody likes you, and they don't really care if you get lynched or not, so if you are voted for two more votes are added. If you don't like being unpopular you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: 2 votes will be added if voted for at all. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the popular student, and because everyone likes you it's unlikely you'll be lynched, since 2 votes are removed from you if you're voted for. If you want to do something useful rather than only defending yourself you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: 2 votes will be removed if voted for at all. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're the psychology student. You're great at finding scumtells and you can /inspect [name] during the night to find some scum for sure. You also have a deep rooted fear of doctors due to your childhood so if any of them try and protect you then you'll die right away. To cure yourself of this you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night. Dies if protected. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're a sociology student! After just a few lessons, you've become a master of assessing human behaviour. Use your abilities to /stalk [name] someone during the night, and use your findings to help your fellow students! Despite being a sociology student, however, you're not that good with people, and will die if anyone tries to protect you. When you inevitably get bored of sociology, you can /leave the class to join another one.
roles.info: Can stalk one person during the night. Dies if protected. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You know what's great? Numbers! You're the mathematics student and your favourite number is two (for obvious reasons) so your vote counts as 2. If you no longer like maths you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Informed they have a vote count of 2. Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You couldn't decide on a class to join, so you're just gonna copy your mates instead. Use /copy [name] during the night to follow someone into a class! If you finally come to a decision of your own, you can /leave and join another one by yourself.
roles.info: Can copy one person during the night (fails if the target is on a different team). Can leave (convert) self to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: Don't tell anyone what you ar... hey, I said don't! You're the tell-tale and you can't stop telling people things like what people studied for, which you've discovered with /expose [name] during the day (you’ll be revealed so watch out for revenge). If the mafia try and shoot you for informing on them you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can expose one person during the day (non revealing). Can use /leave to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

expose.msg: You can now expose someone with /expose [name]! :
expose.exposemsg: ~Self~, the tell-tale, told everyone ~Target~ was a ~Role~!

roles.help: You're a computer science student. You got a bit bored yesterday so you hacked PO giving you the privilege to /inspect [name] during the day to find out someone's side. If you're worried about Oak's vengence you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can inspect (private expose) one person during the day. Can use /leave to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

inspect.msg: You can now inspect someone with /inspect [name]! :
inspect.exposemsg: A Student discovered some fascinating information!

roles.help: You're the economics student and your vote is influenced by market fluctuations. This means you have a vote between -1 and 3. If the market crashes then you may want to /leave to become a normal student again before someone blames you for it.
roles.info: Random vote between -1 and 3. Can use /leave to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're a chemistry student. During the night you're mixing chemicals and by "accident" you can pour hydrochloric acid in someone's wine, with /poison [name], and hope they get thirsty. Remember: the poisoned wine is the one in front of you! If you start blowing stuff up, you're not really suited to a life of chemistry, and you can /leave to become a normal student again.
roles.info: Can poison one person during the night (lasts 2 nights). Can use /leave to convert back into a Student. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're a student and without you there wouldn't be a school! Despite this, the bullies and teachers are all trying to get you expelled or kill you and take your lunch money. You're getting a rather good education so you can /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self to convert into the same role during the night. Reveals as Teacher when inspected. Appears as Teacher on the current roles list. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're a student and without you there wouldn't be a school! Despite this, the bullies and teachers are all trying to get you expelled or kill you and take your lunch money. You're getting a rather good education so you can /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self to convert into the same role during the night. Reveals as Bully when inspected. Appears as Bully on the current roles list. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're a student and without you there wouldn't be a school! Despite this, the bullies and teachers are all trying to get you expelled or kill you and take your lunch money. You're getting a rather good education so you can /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self to convert into the same role during the night. Reveals as Principal when inspected. Appears as Principal on the current roles list. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You failed your test and couldn't become what you wanted. You have another chance though, use /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self to convert into the same role during the night. Reveals as Teacher when inspected. Appears as Teacher on the current roles list. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You failed your test and couldn't become what you wanted. You have another chance though, use /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self to convert into the same role during the night. Reveals as Bully when inspected. Appears as Bully on the current roles list. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You failed your test and couldn't become what you wanted. You have another chance though, use /study during the night to get extra powers such as a distract or extra votes.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self to convert into the same role during the night. Reveals as Principal when inspected. Appears as Principal on the current roles list. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You're just another teacher at the school. You don't know what subject to teach yet but you can use /study to get a random specialized role with new powers. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student but not on the first night (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!).
roles.info: Can study (convert) self during the night to gain additional powers. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're just another teacher at the school. You don't know what subject to teach yet but you can use /study to get a random specialized role with new powers. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!).
roles.info: Can study (convert) self during the night to gain additional powers. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: The school disapproved of you teaching what you wanted. They have given you another chance, so you can /study in the night to get a random specialized role with new powers. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self during the night to gain additional powers. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the history teacher. You know all about history so you're one of the only people who can remember if people attend the school or work at it. You can recall this from your memory with /inspect [name] during the night. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night (shared with role). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the sports teacher. Some of these students think they're good at protecting people from your kills but as a sports teacher, they can't do nothing about you, so you can /smash [name] someone to killthem unless they're protected by  by a literature student. This can only be done once. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Can smash (kill) one person during the night only once (shared with role). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: Maths is wonderful. You're the maths teacher and you can use the wonders of mathematics to entrance people during the night using numbers... using /distract [name]. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Can distract one person during the night (shared with role). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the medicine teacher. Your medical abilities allow you to /protect [name] people to prevent their dying (temporarily). You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Can protect one person during the night (shared with role). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the mafia teacher (not part of the mafia you teach people mafia). Unlike all the people who randomly shout "pro", you are a professional mafia player (and teacher). This lets you use /kill [name] once during the day, but you will be revealed (people might think you're a student though). You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the day (shared with role; revealing). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

kill.killmsg: ~Self~ approaches ~Target~, says hello, and slices them in half, within a split second.

roles.help: You're the philosophy teacher. Your understanding of philosophy means you're the only one who realises the voting phase doesn't correspond to an outside reality, so your vote counts as 2. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Vote counts as 2. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the department head. Your position as head of the department means you have more power than the ordinary teacher. If somebody inspects you they'll think you are only a student as you can change what gets taught to mislead inspectors. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Reveals as Student when inspected. Appears as Student on the current roles list. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the politics teacher. You know about how voting systems work so you can take advantage of it to make yourself rich or nulify the first 2 votes against you. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Ignores 2 votes. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the computer science teacher. You're coding abilities mean that you were able to go onto Pokemon Online and change some code so you're now immune to nightkills. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Ignores nightkills. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're the science teacher. You understand science and you know what science can do... well it can "help" people but it can also be used to make bombs. Your love of bombs means that you always carry one and will kill anyone who kills you. You hate the students, so you can /kill [name] during the night to expel a student  (together with the other teachers) and /curse to convert people into normal students/bullies (together with other teachers, this requires an ancient ritual!). If you want to teach something differently you can use /leave to become a normal teacher again.
roles.info: Revenges nightkills and daykills. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night to kill (shared with team). Can curse one person during the night to convert a target back into their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You're a generic bully at the school. You don't like learning much but it'll help you improve your bullying skills so use /study to gain new powers. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies).
roles.info: Can study (convert) self during the night to gain additional powers. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: The other bullies didn't approve of your choice, but they've given you another chance to /study in the night to gain new powers. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Can study (convert) self during the night to gain additional powers. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You've become a rumourmonger, finding out things about the other kids, and spreading it around school. Due to this, you can /inspect [name] one person a night to find out their secrets. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Can inspect one person during the night (shared with role). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're the jock. You're skill at sports can be used for bullying as beating people up is (in your opinion) a sport. You can use /smash once to kill a target unless they're protected by the literature student. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Can smash (kill) one person during the night only once (shared with role). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're the hooker. You sleep with a lot of people and when people are sleeping with you they don't want to do anything else. You can use /distract [name] to sleep with somebody and you want to use it on lots of people. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.

Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're the medical bully. Some people think you're called this because you make so many people require medical treatment but really it's because you like medicine. You can /protect [name] during the night so that your medicine can protect them from harm. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Can protect one person during the night (shared with role). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're the mafia bully. You wanted to be part of the real mafia but you weren't good eno... they were idiots so they didn't let you join. Now you just take it out on the mafia players and a good way to do that is by using /kill [name] during the day, but you will be revealed (people might think you're a student though). You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the day (shared with role; revealing). Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

kill.killmsg: ~Self~ approaches ~Target~, says hello, and slices them in half, within a split second.

roles.help: You're the prefect. With great power comes great... oppertunity so you use your powers for crime. Being the prefect means that your say is more important than most other people's so your vote counts as 2. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Vote counts as 2. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're the leader of the bullies. You lead the bullies and your extensive knowledge of bullying means you can impersonate a normal student. If anyone inspects you they will think you're a student rather than a bully. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Reveals as Student when inspected. Appears as Student on the current roles list. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're the rich bully. You have so much money and instead of using it to help people you use it to bribe people so they don't notice your bullying (shame on you by the way). Due to your great wealth you can get 2 people to counter-vote for you, protecting you during the votings. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Ignores 2 votes. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're hard and you know it. You have a 100% chance to avoid kills directed at you during the night. You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Ignores nightkills. Can leave (convert) self to return to their starting role. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You're the boxing bully. You went to boxing practice once, so you actually know a few things about fighting. Anyone who tries to take you out during the night will be killed too! You can /kill [name] during the night to forcefully remove a student from the school (with the help of other bullies) and /curse [name] to convert people into normal students or teachers (done together with other bullies). If you want to bully different people you can use /leave to become a normal bully again.
roles.info: Revenges nightkills and daykills. Can kill one person during the night (shared with team). Can curse (convert) one person during the night to convert them back to their starting role (shared with team). Sided with Bullies.

roles.help: You run this place. This is your school and if you don't like someone you can use /kill [name] during the day to expell them. Up to 3 times per game you can call someone to your office so they spend all night waiting for you to see them with /distract [name], so they can do nothing else. You can /detain [someone] during the night to convert them into a role that will be lynched with any vote. You win if you're the last person in the game in which case you can take the school budget and use it to give yourself a big bonus!
roles.info: Can kill one person during the day. Can detain (convert) one person during the night to make them lynchable with one vote and lose all actions. Can distract up to 3 persons per night but only a total of 3 per game. Sided with Principal.

roles.help: You were a student. The principal decided to put you in detention as he didn't like you. Now if anyone votes for you, you'll be expelled.
roles.info: 999 votes added if voted for. Sided with Students.

roles.help: You were a teacher. The principal cut the budget for the department. Now if anyone votes for you, you'll have to find another job as you won't be at this school anymore.
roles.info: 999 votes added if voted for. Sided with Teachers.

roles.help: You were a bully. The principal noticed this and put you in detention. Now if anyone votes for you, you'll be expelled.
roles.info: 999 votes added if voted for. Sided with Bullies.
